text: Manoori ik gawiymanitsi shints aaw sanbata gudots kooc' b́ danifwots ayhudi naashwotsi bo shattsotse, bo maa fengesho is'dek't́ moots kakwedek'tni botesh, maa fengesho is'etsok'on b́ befere Iyesus b́ danifwots kakwed'ek't bobeyiru moots b́ kindi, bo dagots need'dek't, «Jeeno itsh wotowe!» bíet.
